    • getDefsForLocalUse

      public static List<Stmt> getDefsForLocalUse(StmtGraph<?> graph, Local use, Stmt stmt)
      Get all definition-stmts which define the given local used by the given stmt.
      Parameters:
      graph - a stmt graph which contains the given stmts.
      use - a local that is used by the given stmt.
      stmt - a stmt which uses the given local.

    • withNewUse

      @Nonnull public static Stmt withNewUse(@Nonnull Stmt oldStmt, @Nonnull Value oldUse, @Nonnull Value newUse)
      Use newUse to replace the oldUse in oldStmt.
      Parameters:
      oldStmt - a Stmt that has oldUse.
      oldUse - a Value in the useList of oldStmt.
      newUse - a Value is to replace oldUse
      Returns:
      a new Stmt with newUse

      Parameters:
      oldStmt - a Stmt whose def is to be replaced.
